options.description: Comma separated list of tab separated contigs to bin tables.
Comma separated list of binning prediction names.
Engine used for single copy gene identification (diamond/blastp/usearch) [default: diamond].
Predicted proteins (optional) in prodigal fasta format (>contigID_geneNo). Gene prediction step will be skipped.
Write evaluation of input bin sets.
Score threshold until selection algorithm will keep selecting bins (0..1) [default: 0.5].
Penalty for duplicate single copy genes per bin (weight b). Only change if you know what you are doing (0..3) [default: 0.6].
Penalty for megabins (weight c). Only change if you know what you are doing (0..3) [default: 0.5].
Directory of single copy gene database [default: db].
Use existing predicted single copy gene files from a previous run.
Write debug information to log file.
